examples: Polygonatum tsinglingense Y.W. Tsui in Contrib. Inst. Bot. Nation. Acad.  Peiping, 6(3): 135 (1949). Melandrium tatarinowii (Regel) Y.W. Tsui in Fl.  Tsinlingensis, 1(2): 210 (1974). Arenaria auricoma Y.W. Tsui ex L.H. Zhou in  Acta Biol. Plateau Sin., 6: 31 (1987), as 'T.W. Tsui' in error see p. 43 figs.  6-11.
source: Ind. Herb. Sin.: 292 (1993). D.J. Mabberley, The Plant Book: 702 (1987) as 'Tsui  Yon Wen' in error.
